H0.text: To which family of birds do sparrows belong. Fringillidae

H1.text: To which family of birds do sparrows belong. Passerellidae

H2.text: To which family of birds do sparrows belong. Estrildidae

H3.text: To which family of birds do sparrows belong. Sparow

A4.text: New World sparrows are a group of mainly New World passerine birds, forming the family Passerellidae.
